extendedInfo.description: Bazinga! Put some zing in your step with Bubble Zing!Bubble Zing is 50 level energetic, addictive, fast-paced game that will kick you in the pants as you climb higher in levels. You'll groove along to its lively, quick-tempo soundtrack while you swiftly launch marbles into the air. It's easy to learn, fun to play, and put your speed and targeting skills to the test! How to play: *Launch colored marbles by sliding your finger from a marble to a colored bubble (red marbles pop red bubbles; blue pops blue, etc).*Tap the middle marble to change the special item to either a purple marble or a rock.*Pop as many bubbles as you can before too many fall down!Features: -Heart bubbles, poppable by any marble, regain health-Special rock item to show those bubbles who's boss (limit 3)-Purple marbles that get rid of those toxic bubbles-Increasing difficulty as you climb in levelsWe are also on Facebook!http://www.facebook.com/eedgestudios This game features music by Dan Kramer.http://www.danrkramer.comIf you experience any bugs or problems with the app, the development team would like to hear your issues, please contact us at apps@eonedgestudios.com with your information and we will work with you to resolve them to the best of our ability.

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: The bubbles go too quick for you to be able to pop them in time, not enough lives, no instructions, it lags and it\'s just a generally sucky game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: This is awesome! Good job, Kurt!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scratch that
reviews.comment: Im a dumbass for not reading further under all the app info lol
